segments.text: It would be nice to go to the beach sometime this weekend .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What's the weather going to be like ? I may want to go too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The weather this weekend is supposed to be warm .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Will it be good beach weather ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It wouldn't be good if it got cold this weekend .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want this trip to be perfect , I hope it stays warm .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This California weather is so uncertain , it's impossible to know what'll happen .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know . Every day the weather seems different .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would love it if it wasn't always so unpredictable .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That would make it easier for us to make plans .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know . Things are easier when you know what the weather's going to be like .
segments.speaker: S2
